H1.name: Nikki's Pinky
H1.description: Nikki's favorite hairstyle. It shines wherever she goes!

H4.name: Sporty Teenager
H4.description: He is good at almost every sport. He never quits and he is the symbol of persistence.

H5.name: Untamed Heart
H5.description: He is always the center of attention but his eyes seem to gaze aimlessly into the crowds.

H6.name: Rising Star
H6.description: The bright spotlight only follows him and the screaming crowds cry only for him.

H7.name: Elegant Nobleman
H7.description: A gentle, thoughtful nobleman is not supposed to be the silent background forever.

H8.name: Brother Next Door
H8.description: He helps you with homework, looks after your house...Ordinary he may be, but he is irreplaceable.

H9.name: Snow Wolf
H9.description: No one knows where he is from. Only time will reveal the answer.

H10.name: Perfect Senior
H10.description: As the straight-A president of the student union, he always rejects the advances of fawning girls.

H11.name: Mysterious Guest
H11.description: He shows up quietly at midnight and leaves without saying goodbye after a hasty encounter.

H12.name: Fantasy Emissary
H12.description: With an impulsive character and the ability to control magic, he is both weird and funny.

H13.name: Scientist
H13.description: It seems that this weird man can read minds. You need to be careful of him.

H14.name: Coffee Shop Owner
H14.description: Smelling of coffee, he is like a cup of mellow latte. Everyone wants to have a taste of him.

H16.name: Silver-wings Hero
H16.description: The boy has become the silver-wings hero in the hearts of the general public.

H17.name: Shallow Laziness
H17.description: The cat is enjoying its nap, not caring whether it will ruin the smoothness of her hair.

H18.name: Golden Glow
H18.description: The cat will bristle if you take away her favorite food!

H19.name: Wine Red
H19.description: Wine-red middle-length hair hang down the shoulders, expecting a kind master to comb her gently.

H20.name: Pinky-white Curls
H20.description: Who says a princess can't be an elf! With a wisp of fantasy, you can follow the maiden's dreams!

H21.name: Golden-beige Curls
H21.description: She is like a blooming lily in the Wind Valley, the embodiment of innocence and elegance...

H22.name: Dark-blue Curls
H22.description: Handsome, mysterious knight of the summer night. He guards his faith in the name of stars.

H23.name: Teddy Bear·Brown
H23.description: A chocolate hairstyle from the teddy bear suit. It suits every girl with a childlike innocence.

H24.name: Teddy Bear·Pink
H24.description: A pink hairstyle from the teddy bear suit. Like Nikki's pinky hairstyle, it puts you in a good mood.

H25.name: Teddy Bear·Black
H25.description: A black hairstyle from the teddy bear suit. Its neat bangs will make you look young and pretty.

H26.name: Floating Kite·Blue
H26.description: A kite elf from the Magical Realm. Its flowing black ribbons have a touch of mystery

H27.name: Floating Kite·Gray
H27.description: A kite elf from the ocean. Its flowing blue ribbons are like shifting waves.

H28.name: Floating Kite·White
H28.description: A kite elf from the Iceworld. Its pink ribbons are dreamy and sweet.

H29.name: Floating Kite·Gold
H29.description: A kite elf from the Divine Realm. Its white ribbons and gold hair bring out the best of each other.

H30.name: Byzantium's Song·Red
H30.description: A medieval girl with her hair covered by a gorgeous and graceful silk yarn.

H31.name: Byzantium's Song·Yellow
H31.description: A devout medieval girl with her hair covered by a solemn and beautiful silk yarn.

H32.name: Ice Warrior
H32.description: He walks out of the snow slowly. He is cold and strong - just like a warrior from the North Kingdom.

H33.name: Cute Boy
H33.description: Won't a cute shy boy be adored by girls? His sweet smile warms your tiny heart immediately.

H34.name: Autumn Maple
H34.description: Standing in a beautiful pile of fallen leaves, he holds his bike and waits for you quietly.

H35.name: Rose Maiden·Gold
H35.description: She is a little rose in the Pigeon Garden, waiting for her moment to blossom.

H36.name: Rose Maiden·Pink
H36.description: The Queen of Pigeon Kingdom often visits the rose sisters in the garden.

H37.name: Rose Maiden·Silver
H37.description: The rose has become the symbol of the Pigeon Kingdom owing to their iron-and-blood queen.

H38.name: Rose Maiden·Black
H38.description: Only she knows the reason why Queen named the organization as the Iron Rose.

H39.name: Victoria
H39.description: In the Victorian era of booming classicism, this hairstyle represented grace and nostalgia.

H40.name: Young Warbler·Verdant
H40.description: She is Duke Baves's daughter and his only heiress. She is still young and innocent.

H41.name: Young Warbler·Red
H41.description: Miss Elinor is only 15 years old. She is adored by the Queen for her sweet singing voice.

H42.name: Rich Lady
H42.description: A tender charm lies in the forehead curls. It gets mellower as time goes by.

H43.name: Elf·Gold
H43.description: The pigeon kingdom's magical earth has nurtured elves, dwarfs, humans and goblins.

H44.name: Elf·White
H44.description: Elves inhabit in the depths of Pigeon Forest. They are all very beautiful.

H46.name: Pretty Pony Tail
H46.description: Bathed in sunlight, it runs like liquid gold...

H48.name: Violet Peony
H48.description: When she is born on this miraculous continent, what stir will she cause?

H49.name: Pink Peony
H49.description: Apparently there are four famous types of Cloud tree-peonies. Pink Peony is the most fragrant one.

H50.name: Carelessness
H50.description: Living in Lilith Kingdom is like walking into a fairy tale. Everything is so happy and pure.

H51.name: Carefree·Pale
H51.description: The Republic of Wasteland never cared about material wealth or power.

H52.name: Carefree·Black
H52.description: Only girls from the Cloud Empire can have hair as black as sandalwood...

H53.name: Sunflower
H53.description: When you are young and innocent, even a smiling face can attract butterflies.

H54.name: Rice Butterfly
H54.description: An elfin born in the Pigeon Kingdom. A very close friend of Bobo!

H55.name: Childhood Heart
H55.description: When we were young, we laughed all the time and had nothing to worry about.

H56.name: Innocent Years
H56.description: There was always someone or something that gave us unforgettable memories when we were young.

H57.name: Cloud Dancer
H57.description: Nikki learned this hairstyle in the Cloud. It was only meant for the best dancers!

H58.name: Light Tone
H58.description: The hair from both sides are combed into buns and the remaining hair hang down loosely.

H59.name: Glaze Melody
H59.description: Like sunlight falling through the leaves, it shimmers vivid rays of light.

H60.name: Pretty Lady·Black
H60.description: A classical, sweet hairstyle with a bit of variation in its braids. Not a simple hairstyle at all!

H61.name: Iceworld Whisper
H61.description: Nikki was taught this hairstyle when she accidentally rescued the queen of an island country.

H63.name: Angel Bunny
H63.description: A lovely and naughty hairstyle. High ponytails and bouncing hair will make you as cute as a bunny!

H64.name: Gourds
H64.description: Young girls in Cloud Empire often wear this hairstyle. You will not see it anywhere else.

H65.name: Gourd Bell
H65.description: Young girls in Cloud Empire often wear this hairstyle. The accessory of bells look super cute!

H66.name: Gourd Bells
H66.description: Young girls in Cloud Empire often wear this hairstyle. The accessory of bells look super cute!

H67.name: Music Princess
H67.description: It turns you into an angel of musical notes, dancing freely among wonderful melodies.

H68.name: Wasteland Jewel
H68.description: On the day she was born, the lion king brought her the holy spring fruit which cures all diseases.

H69.name: Wasteland Jewel·Rare
H69.description: Daughter of the jungle, jewel of the forest, beloved princess of the Wasteland.

H70.name: Wasteland Jewel·Epic
H70.description: As expected, she has become the most beautiful woman in Republic of Wasteland.

H71.name: School Maid
H71.description: According to my sister, I can take the Design Material Recognition course when high school starts!

H72.name: School Girl·Rare
H72.description: As the subject representative of Design Material Recognition, she was always top of the class.

H74.name: Doll·Gold
H74.description: She is like a cutie in fairy tales. Her long eyelashes make her look like a doll.

H76.name: Cutie
H76.description: She was born in the Flourishing Orchard in the Pigeon Kingdom suburb.

H77.name: Cutie·Rare
H77.description: She's the most famous daughter of the orchard. She has managed the orchard ever since she grew up.

H78.name: Wild
H78.description: If you hit on a pretty boy in North Kingdom, be careful. Because he may turn out to be a girl.

H79.name: Wild·Rare
H79.description: In the North everyone must enlist once they reach a certain age irregardless of gender.

H80.name: Tranquil Time
H80.description: In the Pigeon Café, you can sit leisurely in the sunlight and read a book.

H81.name: Tranquil Time·Rare
H81.description: In the Cloud Teahouse, you can drink a cup of tea and spend the whole afternoon enjoying the opera.

H82.name: Tranquil Time·Epic
H82.description: In the Lilith Garden, you can watch the delicate blossoms and enjoy some exquisite afternoon tea.

H83.name: Pigeon Song·Brown
H83.description: If the white pigeon of the Pigeon Kingdom lays on your shoulder, you will become the best designer.

H84.name: Pigeon Song·Blue
H84.description: When Queen Elle was a young princess, she already displayed her exceptional talent as a stylist.

H91.name: Flower Bud
H91.description: Just like a bud ready to burst in the Lilith Kingdom, her beauty starts to bloom.

H92.name: Flower Bud·Rare
H92.description: She is not comparing with other flowers. She is just trying to be prettier than she was yesterday.

H93.name: Little Lion
H93.description: The little lion in the Pigeon Forest is so cute that people cannot resist rubbing her fluffy ears!

H94.name: Wheat Ears
H94.description: Enjoying the spring wind at the Apple Federation suburbs and listening to wheat ears' whispers...

H95.name: Wheat Ears·Rare
H95.description: Be one with the field and sing with wheat ears. Feel the beauty of nature on this magical land.

H97.name: Red Bean Kiss
H97.description: Enjoy the warmness of the red beans in the chilly winter.

H98.name: Kiss of the red bean
H98.description: Lunar is a typical virtuous Cloud maiden. She is even more attractive when she is cooking.

H99.name: Citrus
H99.description: As Timi's best friend, this girl is always encouraging her to pursue her own happiness.

H100.name: Reind
H100.description: She was Timi's classmate when Timi was a trainee in Lilith Academy. She is a kind, sincere girl.

H102.name: Pretty Girl
H102.description: Although she keeps her hair short, this pretty girl will become a beautiful woman someday.

H103.name: Baby Face
H103.description: Super delicate and young, a baby face with such a hairstyle is totally irresistible.

H104.name: Her Beauty
H104.description: Serious office lady with outstanding execution and leadership abilities.

H105.name: Wicker
H105.description: Among the green trees and red flowers, the picturesque lake can be seen from the pavilion.

H106.name: Willow·Rare
H106.description: A sudden shower under the white clouds floods the river.

H107.name: Vintage England
H107.description: Walking on the streets of Pigeon Kingdom, Nikki has a feeling that she is in medieval Europe.

H108.name: Little Nurse
H108.description: This hairstyle goes well with a nurse cap. It looks very gentle.

H109.name: Musical Notes­Black
H109.description: As beautiful melodies are played by nimble fingers, everything is so peaceful and nice...

H110.name: Golden Rice
H110.description: Rice ears spread under the warm sun, reflecting rays as dazzling as gold.

H111.name: Western Maiden
H111.description: The sad melodies sung by the maiden from the west travel across the vast grassland.

H112.name: Western Maiden·Rare
H112.description: The sad melodies sung by the maiden from the west travel across the vast grassland.

H113.name: Cheese Cake
H113.description: Perhaps it's because of working in the dessert shop, there is always a sweet smell in the air.

H114.name: Cheese Cake·Rare
H114.description: Perhaps it's because of working in the dessert shop, there is always a sweet smell in the air.

H115.name: Cheese Cake·Epic
H115.description: Perhaps it's because of working in the dessert shop, there is always a sweet smell in the air.

H116.name: Legal Belle
H116.description: She is not only hard-working but also single! To those male elites who are interested, act now!

H117.name: Whole City
H117.description: The storm is brewing over the whole city. But it is forgotten in dreamy Shanghai at night.

H118.name: Whole City·Rare
H118.description: The storm is brewing over the whole city. But it is forgotten in dreamy Shanghai at night.

H119.name: Whole City·Epic
H119.description: The storm is brewing over the whole city. But it is forgotten in dreamy Shanghai at night.

H120.name: Dreamland
H120.description: The body wash of strawberry smell is specially used by those hoping for a sweet nice dream.

H121.name: Wild·Epic
H121.description: After transferring to a private school in the Apple Federation, she was still outstanding.

H122.name: Tender Charm
H122.description: This type of charm and temperament can only happen over time. A pretty face is not enough!

H123.name: Moon Destiny
H123.description: Nikki was lucky to witness a wedding in a church when she traveled around the Apple Federation.

H124.name: Bambi
H124.description: Its shoulder-length wavy hair and neat bangs look cute and sweet.

H125.name: Star of Dancing
H125.description: As the hottest rising dance star on the continent, Sofia is the pride of the Lilith Kingdom.

H126.name: Gothic Lolita
H126.description: There are no more innocent smiles, only an empty, mysterious hole, without a single breath of life.

H127.name: Butterfly·Epic
H127.description: When the butterfly flutters, the fragrance will travel one hundred miles away.

H128.name: Purple Butterfly
H128.description: When the butterfly flutters, the fragrance will travel one hundred miles away.

H129.name: Watery
H129.description: Only in the Pigeon Kingdom can you see such a cute elf.

H130.name: Watery·Rare
H130.description: Only in the Pigeon Kingdom can you see such a cute elf.

H131.name: Dragon Maiden
H131.description: Her skin is snow white and her magnificence is out of this world.

H132.name: Vanilla
H132.description: On a sunny spring day, the lake becomes tranquil and merges with the azure sky into one.

H133.name: Maple
H133.description: As a female ninja in the Cloud, the first thing you need is ruthlessness.

H134.name: Maple·Rare
H134.description: The master once said, ruthlessness is a ninja's most deadly weapon.

H135.name: Maple·Epic
H135.description: Only when you have a strong heart can you fight with no hesitation, thus hiding your weaknesses.

H136.name: Higanbana
H136.description: The underworld has its beauty, the devils have their gentle side.

H137.name: Geisha·Rare
H137.description: Some flowers fade on the other side. Some flowers bloom on the other side.

H138.name: Geisha·Epic
H138.description: During the flower season, only the rosa rubus are blossoming.

H139.name: Fox Spirit
H139.description: Deep inside the forest of Cloud, a little fox, under the nourishment of nature, gained human's form.

H140.name: Butterfly
H140.description: The infant butterfly first opens its eyes and sees the world, filled with innocence and hope.

H141.name: Butterfly·Rare
H141.description: The little butterfly spreads its wings gradually and flies towards the colorful flower field.

H142.name: Bird Song
H142.description: The lone bird dances to the music of the flute and then flies away by itself.

H143.name: Romeo
H143.description: Quiet! What's that light coming through the window? It's the east! Juliet is the sun!

H144.name: Tender April
H144.description: You are like the tender April days, a dancing spirit in the warmth of spring.

H145.name: Imperial Maid
H145.description: Nikki always watched imperial dramas with her mom as a child to see the ancient girls' hairstyles.

H146.name: Orchis
H146.description: The sun shines while the plants absorb light. Only the orchids are silently delivering their scent.

H147.name: Stunning Visage
H147.description: You don't need to see their traditional clothing to recognize a Cloud girl when you see one.

H148.name: Little Red Riding Hood
H148.description: Long ago, there was a cute and gentle girl.

H149.name: Red Hat·Rare
H149.description: Long ago, there was a cute and gentle girl who lived in a village with her parents.

H150.name: Red Hat·Epic
H150.description: Long ago, there was a girl who lived in a village with her parents. Her gran lived in the forest.

H152.name: Dream Seeker
H152.description: She hoped to go to the North Kingdom and experience the mysterious country when she grew up.

H153.name: Haste
H153.description: Do you still remember your childhood dream? It's like a flower that will never wither.
obtained-from: Achievement: On the Journey·Volume 1 Princess Level, Stage 32

H154.name: Western Dancer
H154.description: In the western Cloud Empire, there are the most stylish and enchanting dancers.

H155.name: Sweetie
H155.description: The baker's cakes look quite sweet as well!

H156.name: Sweetie·Silver
H156.description: The baker's cakes look quite sweet as well!

H159.name: Energetic Cutie
H159.description: Nobody can resist such a cute girl. With those puppy eyes, she can get whatever she wants.

H160.name: Gentle Waiter
H160.description: Biggest Pigeon Empire chain hotel - the Kloss Family's oldest son, is sent to do grass root work!

H161.name: Polite Waiter
H161.description: Biggest Pigeon Empire chain hotel - the Kloss Family's second son, is sent to do grass root work!

H163.name: Obedient Waiter
H163.description: Biggest Pigeon Empire chain hotel - the Kloss Family's youngest son, is sent to do grass root work!

H164.name: Night Rhythm
H164.description: The night is filled with a beautiful melody. It's the rhythm of the night.

H165.name: Fresh Pomelo
H165.description: This hairstyle makes people hungry! Huh? That sounded weird.

H166.name: Benevolence
H166.description: Being a doctor to heal the wounded and rescue the dying.

H167.name: Alice
H167.description: Alice is an innocent and lovely girl, she has the most precious attribute: curiosity.

H168.name: Little Sailor
H168.description: She wants to grow up quickly and go out to the sea to search for her sailor dad, who never returned.

H169.name: Flower Hairpin
H169.description: She prays in the pigeon church every day, hoping her mother will recover from her disease soon.

H170.name: Lovely Lady
H170.description: Her dream is to go to the Cloud Empire to learn more about cloth and fabric.

H171.name: Fruit Jam
H171.description: A cream cake with fresh jam on it. It's super delicious!

H172.name: Vortex
H172.description: Born in a chaotic age of the Pigeon Empire when the whole nation is in unrest. Uncertain times.

H173.name: Tiny Puff
H173.description: When your love towards desserts is deep enough, you will become a dessert.

H174.name: Night Seer
H174.description: As the only Star Seer in Lilith, she possesses a natural power to perform divination.

H178.name: Kids Show Host
H178.description: As a Kids Show Host of the Apple Federation, many kids love her because her face looks so cute!

H179.name: Rock Girl·Red
H179.description: She is the most promising rock singer in the Apple Federation. Her voice is as good as her guitar.

H180.name: Rock Girl·Purple
H180.description: She is the most promising rock singer in the Apple Federation. Her voice is as good as her guitar.

H181.name: Sunset Song·Brown
H181.description: When your life is still shining, keep smiling. Delve into the past and guide your once-aching heart.

H183.name: Sunset Song·Gold
H183.description: Love may have saddened your heart in the past, but it will soon turn into a dream.

H184.name: Sunset Song·Purple
H184.description: Who can become a cassia tree under the moonlight and escape the pain of homesickness?

H185.name: Ahoge·Black
H185.description: She insists that strand of hair is the antenna of inspiration, but nobody believes her.

H186.name: Ahoge·Gold
H186.description: The image of a mature and lofty lady is totally ruined by this silly strand of hair.

H187.name: Rebellious Girl
H187.description: Momo! Can you stop thinking about TV dramas? She is a rock singer!

H188.description: The river of civilization has quietly flowed for mellenia. Every drop of water has its story.

H189.description: There is an old man on the Ship Island of the Pigeon Ocean who lives to record dreams.

H190.name: Timi's Bob

H192.name: Transfer Student·Brown
H192.description: She just transferred to a school in the Apple Federation and is curious about this modern nation.

H193.name: Transfer Student·Gold
H193.description: She just transferred to a school in the Apple Federation and her blond curly hair makes her popular.

H194.name: Small Poem
H194.description: She has a pretty notebook which she uses to record her poems when she gets sentimental.

H195.name: Butterfly Flowers
H195.description: She is a grown female elf in the Pigeon Forest and the big sister of the butterfly fairies.

H196.name: Hat Addict
H196.description: You think that is a hairstyle + head ornaments? Then you're completely wrong! Bah ha ha ha!

H198.name: Momika

H199.name: Silver Radiance
H199.description: Who said there are no pretty girls in the North Kingdom?

H200.name: Gentle Sister
H200.description: Nikki and Momo left their suitcase in the waiting room. Luckily a woman helped them recover it.

H201.name: Tea Tune
H201.description: Music and flowers are absolutely necessary if you want to enjoy your afternoon in Lilith.

H202.name: Night Shade
H202.description: Even the fantastic Lilith has its dark side.

H204.name: Polite Assistant
H204.description: The docile assistant is actually quite strict. She is an uncompromising workaholic.

H205.name: Locco
H205.description: Locco is Bobo's friend. Both of them are the standard Lilith-style cute girls.

H206.name: Beautiful Agent
H206.description: She is a female agent of the Special Operation Squad, but she is as good as a male agent.

H207.name: Cloud Ink

H208.name: Rosy Clouds

H209.name: Poetic Dream
H209.description: Clouds disappear. Dreams fade. The old friend is no where to be found.

H210.name: Flower Field Girl
H210.description: She heard her grandma's flower elf dancing party story, so she often comes to the garden.

H214.name: Admiration
H214.description: It looks like Nikki's pink hair at first glance, but Apple Federation stylists have altered it.

H215.name: Warmness
H215.description: Nikki learned and matured during the journey in Miraland, and now she is becoming a gorgeous woman.

H217.name: Warmness·Brown
H217.description: People said it's a beautiful hairstyle only second best to the default pink hair. Do you know why?

H219.name: Waving Veil
H219.description: Different from her past hairstyles, Nikki's pink hair flows with the wind, looking more mature and beautiful.

H220.name: Waving Veil·Gold
H220.description: The hairstyle is just like its exclusive suit: dashing.

H226.name: Brocade Heart
H226.description: An exquisite jade brocade appears in the world. Nobles go through great lengths just for a glance.

H227.name: Lady Wu Mei
H227.description: She was granted the title Wu Mei by Tang Taizong, and the title Queen of Heaven by Tang Gaozong.

H228.name: Heavenly Emperor
H228.description: She was the only female emperor in China's history.

H232.name: Pigeon Boy
H232.description: When the handsome pigeon boy passed by on a white horse, he won the hearts of countless girls.

H233.name: Apple Pie

H235.name: Upstyle Lisa

H236.name: Siren

H238.name: Kiki
